Mark,

> Understanding visibility[1] is one of the keys to explaining why Web
> services currently suck, IMO.  I've got to think of a way to explain it
> better.  I've tried every approach I can think of.

I hear the trumpet; I stand ready to answer the call!

> 
> If we can do this, I expect we'll see a mass "A ha!" moment, and Web
> services will come crumbling down.

You need to be drinking way less caffein, my friend.

Can you give a brief rundown of the approaches you've tried and
how/why they don't seem to be getting thru?

Walden
